CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In this manuscript , we report the synthesis and characterization of three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-(2-ethylhex- yl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole ) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ) , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ) and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ) , by using IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)] (PIDT) - This is the conjugated polymer material that is synthesized and characterized in the manuscript.
2. poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] (PIDT-EHNT) - This is another conjugated polymer material that is synthesized and characterized in the manuscript.
3. poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3'-dodecyl-5-(2,2'-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] (PIDT-C12NT) - This is the third conjugated polymer material that is synthesized and characterized in the manuscript.
4. IDT - This stands for "weak donor", which is a type of material used in the synthesis of the conjugated polymers.
5. NT - This stands for "strong acceptor", which is another type of material used in the synthesis of the conjugated polymers.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to "Material Name" in the given text:

1. poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)] (PIDT)
2. poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] (PIDT-EHNT)
3. poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3'-dodecyl-5-(2,2'-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] (PIDT-C12NT)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)] (PIDT) |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] (PIDT-EHNT) |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3'-dodecyl-5-(2,2'-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] (PIDT-C12NT) |

Sure! Let's identify the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. "Property Value": In the first sentence, "Property Value" refers to the synthesis and characterization of the three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers.
2. "Property Value": In the second sentence, "Property Value" refers to the use of IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor in the synthesis of the polymers.
3. "Property Value": In the third sentence, "Property Value" refers to the three polymers synthesized in the study: poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ), poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ), and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ).

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given text:

1. "Property Value" - This is the most direct reference to the value of material properties, as it is the term used to describe the value of a material's property.

3. "Material Property Value" - This term is similar to "Property Value" and is used to refer to the value of a material's property.

Here are the irrelevant entities in the text:
